articles.title: Cardi B Addresses Offset's Claims She Cheated on Him - Cosmopolitan
articles.description: Cardi dropped a 3-minute recording shutting Offset down and telling him to “stop acting stupid.”
articles.content: Cardi B has responded to Offsets since-deleted claims that she cheated on him with another man. Cardi addressed Offsets claims on Twitter Spaces, singing some lyrics from I Should Have Cheated by Key… [+1606 chars]

articles.title: Barbie and Ken unveil bright-pink lifesize dollhouse in Malibu - Dezeen
articles.description: Airbnb has unveiled Barbie's Malibu Dreamhouse, an all-pink California mansion that features an outside disco dance floor, an infinity pool and a Western-themed bedroom.
articles.content:

articles.title: WWE News: Cody Rhodes' Dog Debuts On Raw, Miz Attacks Tommaso Ciampa - 411mania.com
articles.description: Cody Rhodes' dog Pharaoh made his official debut on this week's WWE Raw. The Miz also attacked Tommaso Ciampa.
articles.content: – Cody Rhodes’ dog Pharaoh made his official debut on this week’s WWE Raw. Tonight’s show saw Rhodes appear in a backstage segment with Pharaoh, who made several appearances on AEW TV during Rhodes’ … [+501 chars]
